title: 1 teen killed, another wounded in Willingboro shooting
content:
WILLINGBORO - One 16-year-old was killed and another was wounded in a shooting outside a home in Willingboro.
Burlington County prosecutors say Ibn Perry was gunned down outside the home where he lived on Plumtree Lane around 8 p.m. Monday.
Another boy was taken to a hospital after he was shot in the ankle. A third teen was not wounded.
Police have not released the names of the other teens.
No weapons were recovered and no arrests have been made.
